resources.string: WeebsApp adalah aplikasi Wallpaper berbasis Android. Aplikasi ini dirancang untuk memberikan pengalaman penggunaan yang sederhana, cepat, dan efisien. RaamApp dikembangkan dengan fokus pada kenyamanan, performa, dan kemudahan pengguna, sehingga cocok digunakan oleh berbagai kalangan

• Search Bar
• Apply to Wallpaper
• Switch Theme

• Visi Aplikasi
 Menjadi platform wallpaper yang menghadirkan visual berkualitas tinggi untuk mempercantik perangkat dan mengekspresikan karakter setiap pengguna

 • Tujuan aplikasi
 Menyediakan koleksi Wallpaper yang beragam, mudah diakses, dan selalu diperbarui agar pengguna dapat menemukan tampilan yang sesuai dengan gaya dan suasana mereka
FrontEnd Developer and Mobile Developer Enthusiast\nBuilding simple, useful and clean mobile experience

I am an Android developer who enjoys building clean, functional, and user-friendly applications. I focus on writting simple, maintainable code while continuously learning modern Android development pratices
Whatever you are, be the good one.

• HTML
• CSS
• Javascript
• Java
• Python
• PHP

This application was developed as a final project for my Mobile Progamming course. It is designed to be simple and visually aesthetic, allowing users to explore and experience the application in a clear, comfortable, and engaging way

WeebsApp respect your privacy. This application does not collect, store, or share any personal user data. All wallpapers and application data are stored locally on the users device. WeebsApp only request permissions that are necessary for its core functionality, such as setting wallpapers. We do not use third-party analytics, tracking, or advertising services.

By using WeebsApp, you agree that this application is provided for personal and non-commercial use only. All content is intended for educational and demonstration purpose. The developer is not responsible for misuse of the application or its content. The application is provided "as is" without any warranties, and features may change at any time.
